meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the replication of retroviruses.
meanings.sent1: The antiretroviral medication stopped the virus from multiplying.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend antiretroviral treatment to control the spread of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The antiretroviral pills put a stop to the virus's party inside the body.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight the illness was like an antiretroviral shield against the virus.
meanings.sent5: The antiretroviral effect was like a superhero protecting the body from the virus invasion.

meanings.definition: A drug used to treat retroviral infections.
meanings.sent1: She took her antiretroviral every day to manage the infection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an antiretroviral to combat the retrovirus.
meanings.sent3: The antiretroviral medication was like a daily shield against the virus.
meanings.sent4: His recovery was as swift as the action of the antiretroviral drug.
meanings.sent5: The antiretroviral treatment was the key to fighting off the retroviral infection.
